text: "Guess what? You're going to wake up tomorrow and have an absolutely phenomenal day. And if your day isn't phenomenal, it'll still be better than today."
author: Celine "starsmitten" Cheung

text: "Find people that are like balloons, people that lift you up; you don't want to be around people that are anchors that weigh you down."
author: Mom
